Name: Hex Tunnel
About the game: Enter another dimension and master the elements to become a supreme being. With arcade, chaos and ultra modes in procedural stages ensures a unique experience. Avoid all surfaces and reach the exit to be victorious. Features • Arcade - ICE / FIRE / WATER / EARTH / AIR elements are levels with distinct objects to avoid • Chaos - chaotic combination of sections without a theme • Ultra - speed is the focus • in game gaze based VR navigation button input not required for gameplay control music by Imphenzia
